alert.note: Alert for Clark; Day; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 4:48PM MDT until August 10 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Conde, or 20 miles southeast of Warner, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Conde around 600 PM CDT. Crandall around 605 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
